title: VERY LOW FPS DROP
body:
Hello there, 

Recently, I have been struggling adamantly with the recent windows 10 update (Jan. 3, 2018): https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/4056892/windows-10-update-kb4056892. Ever since the reboot of my computer with this update, I have been experiencing HEAVY fps drop in-game, going as low as 1 fps and no higher than 6 fps. I've tried all I can so far...
-League FPS fix page,
-Updating driver
-Deleting/pausing background applications 
-In-game options/client options

Really interested in hearing if anyone else has any other secret methods to fixing this issue!

replies.body:
The issue could be with the full screen optimization with the recent OS update.  The following steps may help but test it in custom and let me know:

Right click the League Icon on your Desktop -> Properties -> Compatibility -> Disable Fullscreen Optimization

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3MzcX66h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-09T18:03:51.124+0000)

No worries, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs.  Attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can dig into this with you and help find some more options.  See you there!
